transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ji sir, namaste.
Customer: Ji, namaste.
Executive: Sir, mere ko refined oil chahiye tha.
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Refined oil sir.
Customer: Refined oil chahiye ya refined oil ke liye chahiye ki?
Executive: Refined oil chahiye sir.
Customer: Aap kahan se baat kar rahe hain ji?
Customer: Karnataka se sir.
Executive: Nahi, aap kis company se baat kar rahe hain, ye puch raha tha.
Customer: Company
Executive: Nahi sir, nahi sir, main distributor lene wala hai.
Executive: Okay, matlab aapko kitna chahiye approx kitna?
Customer: Maine ka teen, teen ton tak lagta hai sir.
Executive: Three ton. Achcha aapki company kis naam se aapne yahan pe registered kiya hua hai IndiaMART pe khud ko?
Customer: Haan sir, registered hai sir.
Executive: Kis naam se registered hai? Matlab kis company se? Wo mera hai, wo mera to pure oil ka hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Nahi, aapne apni company, aapne apni company registered kari hai kya yahan pe? Aapko requirement hai ya phir abhi aap kaise karna chahte hain? Kyunki aapne, jaise main abhi IndiaMART mein as a account manager hun. Theek hai? Aapne mujhe call kiya hai, to main bhi isme koi distributor nahi hun ya phir main koi seller nahi hun isme. Theek hai? To aapko
Customer: Ji, okay. Mere ko kisi ne number bheja tha.
Executive: Ji ji. Jaise ki kisne diya tha aapko number?
Customer: Wo Mumbai ka ek aadmi hai hamara pehchan ka, wohi diya tha.
Executive: Haan haan. Theek hai, koi nahi. Unse baat zara boliyega na ki aapne inka number diya, wo account manager ka number hai. Wo accounts handle karte hain, wo haan, wo sale nahi karte. To agar aapko isme chahiye to aap requirement dal dijiye, aapke paas kisi na kisi ka call aa jayega.
Customer: Ji. Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: IndiaMART mein registered hai sir hamara company.
Executive: Haan haan, matlab agar aapko requirement hai, to aap na requirement post pe jaake wahan pe dal dijiye. Aas paas jinke jo bhi aapke aas paas deal karte honge na, unka aapke paas call aa jayega. Theek hai? Aur jo bhi aapke paas bech rahe hain, unko aap deal kar sakte ho.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Okay. Okay, thank you.
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs refined oil.

- Wants to know company registration details.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified role as account manager.

- Advised to post requirement on IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer to post requirement on IndiaMART.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refined oil, distributor, registration, requirement
